name: Parents Making a Change (PMAC)
description: Parents Making a Change (PMAC) empowers Black and Brown adult family members to advocate for positive change in their children’s schools and communities. PMAC develops the leadership, skills, and confidence of thousands of parents. Coleman provides on-going support as PMAC members lead high-impact policy efforts on issues ranging from bilingual and special education programming to student access, technology resources, and workforce development programs. Coleman develops committed life-long leade
